attributes.action: We call on David Cameron to order the publication of the NHS Risk Register
attributes.additional_details: We, the signatories, wish for the government to publish the NHS Risk Register that detail the risks posed by their new Health & Social Care Bill. The Information Commissioner has ordered the government to publish it, and so we ask you, David Cameron, to abide by that judgement and drop your appeal.

rejection.details: Petition already exists: TELL US WHAT'S IN THE SECRET RISK REGISTER ABOUT THE NEW HEALTH AND SOCIAL CARE BILL!
